Organic Deconstruction.name: Organic Deconstruction
Organic Deconstruction.blurb: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
Organic Deconstruction.description: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a Deconstruction stack for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.
Organic Deconstruction.description2: The third stack consumes them all, dealing 33 − 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP)  bonus true damage.

Plasma Fission.name: Plasma Fission
Plasma Fission.blurb: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
Plasma Fission.description: Active: Vel'Koz fires an energy bolt that collides with the first enemy hit to deal  magic damage and  slow by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration.
Plasma Fission.description2: At the end of its range, upon re-activation after 0.25 seconds, or upon colliding with an enemy, the bolt splits in half, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory.
Plasma Fission.description3: Plasma Fission restores  mana per target killed.
Plasma Fission.notes:
* An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a spell shield.
 Plasma Fission can travel a maximum ~1521 units diagonally.

Void Rift.name: Void Rift
Void Rift.blurb: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
Void Rift.description: Passive: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Void Rift.description2: Active: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line, dealing magic damage and leaving behind a trail. After a 0.25 seconds delay, the trail detonates, dealing magic damage.
Void Rift.leveling2: Initial Magic Damage:30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 (+ 15% AP)Detonation Magic Damage:45 / 75 / 105 / 135 / 165 (+ 25% AP)Maximum Damage:75 / 125 / 175 / 225 / 275 (+ 40% AP)
Void Rift.notes:
* Vel'Koz can cast Void Rift while moving but not while attacking.
  Unbreakable and  Wind Wall will block the rift from forming over them, but they will not destroy the trail that was created before it.
 Void Rift must finish before another can be cast.

Tectonic Disruption.name: Tectonic Disruption
Tectonic Disruption.blurb: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
Tectonic Disruption.description: Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after 0.55 seconds, briefly providing  sight, dealing magic damage and  suspending enemies in the area for 0.75 seconds. If the area is created close to Vel'Koz, enemies hit are also slightly  knocked back in the direction of the cast.
Tectonic Disruption.notes:
* Tectonic Disruption's suspension is affected by  Tenacity.
 The required proximity for displacement is relative to Vel'Koz's position when casting and not his current one.
 There is a brief ~0.1 second cast time before the projectile begins to travel.
 Although considered to be a projectile,  Unbreakable and  Wind Wall will block Tectonic Disruption, but will not destroy it visually.

Life Form Disintegration Ray.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
Life Form Disintegration Ray.blurb: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
Life Form Disintegration Ray.description: Passive - Researched:  Deconstructing enemy champions marks them as  Researched for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and ability damage refresh the duration on-hit.
Life Form Disintegration Ray.description2: Active: Vel'Koz channels for 2.5 seconds to project an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. Reactivating Life Form Disintegration Ray ends the channel.
Life Form Disintegration Ray.description3: The ray deals magic damage in 0.25 seconds intervals, and  slows by 20% for 1 second.  Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit.  Researched enemies take true damage instead.
Life Form Disintegration Ray.notes:
* Life Form Disintegration Ray's trajectory updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of Vel'Koz to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
 The beam covers Vel'Koz's hitbox, damaging enemies standing close.
